Verses: 1 yovaas Raajaavaagirapodhu Ezhuvayadhaayirundhu, Naarpadhu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Peyersebaapattanaththaalaana Avan Thaayin Per Sibiyaal.
2 aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaavin Naalellaam Yovaas Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan.
3 avanukku Yoidhaa Irandu Sthreegalai Vivaagancheydhu Koduththaan; Avargalaal Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
4 adharkuppinbu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaip Pudhuppikka Yovaas Viruppankondaan.

5 avan Aasaariraiyum Leviyaraiyum Koodi Varachcheydhu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Yoodhaa Pattanangalukkup Purappattuppoi, Ungal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Varushaavarusham Pazhudhupaarkkiradharku, Isravelengum Panam Segariyungal; Indhak Kaariyaththaith Thaamadhamillaamal Seyyungal Endraan. Aanaalum Leviyar Thaamadhampanninaargal.

6 appozhudhu Raajaa Yoidhaa Ennum Thalaivanai Azhaippiththu: Saatchiyin Vaasasthalaththukkuk Kodukka, Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Kattalaiyitta Variyai Yoodhaavinidaththilum, Erusalemiyaridaththilum, Isravel Sabaiyaaridaththilum Vaangi Varugiradharku, Leviyarai Neer Visaariyaamarponadhenna?

7 andhap Pollaadha Sthreeyaagiya Aththaaliyaaludaiya Makkal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Balavandhamaaith Thirandhu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilulla Pradhishtai Pannappattavaigalaiyellaam Paagaalgalukkaaga Selavupannippottaargale Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Raajaavin Sorpadi Oru Pettiyai Undaakki, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththu Vaasalukkup Purambe Vaiththu,
9 karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Vanaandharaththil Isravelukkuk Kattalaiyitta Variyaik Karththarukkuk Konduvaarungal Endru Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilum Paraisaatruviththaargal.
10 appozhudhu Ellaap Prabukkalum Ellaa Janangalum Sandhoshamaaik Konduvandhu Pettiniraiya Adhile Pottaargal.

11 vegupanam Undendru Kandu, Leviyar Kaiyaal Andhap Petti Raajaavin Visaarippukkaarar Andaiyile Konduvarappadumpodhu, Raajaavin Sambiradhiyum Pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Visaarippukkaaranum Vandhu, Pettiyilirukkiradhaik Kottiyeduththu, Adhaith Thirumba Adhin Sthaanaththile Vaippaargal; Ippadi Naalukkunaal Seydhu Migundha Panaththai Serththaargal.

12 adhai Raajaavum Yoidhaavum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Velaiyai Visaarikkum Oozhiyakkaarar Kaiyile Koduththaargal; Adhinaal Avargal Karththarudaiyaaalayaththaip Pudhuppikkumpadi, Kalthachcharaiyum Thachcharaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaip Pazhudhupaarkkumpadi Kotraraiyum Kannaaraiyum Koolikku Amarththikkondaargal.
13 appadi Velaiyai Visaarikkiravargal Thangal Kaiyinaale Velaiyai Nadandherappanni, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Adhin Mundhina Seerukkuk Konduvandhu Adhai Balappaduththinaargal.

14 adhai Mudiththuth Theerndhapinbu, Meendha Panaththai Raajaavukkum Yoidhaavukkum Munbaaga Konduvandhaargal; Adhile Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Seyyappadum Panimuttugalaiyum, Aaraadhanai Pali Mudhaliyavaigalukku Vendiya Panimuttugalaiyum, Kalasangalaiyum, Porpaaththirangalaiyum, Vellippaaththirangalaiyum Pannuviththaan; Yoidhaavin Naalellaam Niththam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalai Seluththi Vandhaargal.
15 yoidhaa Theerkkaayusullavanaai Mudhirvayadhil Mariththaan; Avan Maranamadaigirapodhu Nootrumuppadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan.
16 avan Dhevanukkaagavum Avarudaiya Aalayaththirkaagavum Isravelukku Nanmaiseydhapadiyinaal, Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Raajaakkalandaiyile Adakkampanninaargal.
17 yoidhaa Maranamadaindhapinbu Yoodhaavin Prabukkal Vandhu, Raajaavai Panindhukondaargal; Appozhudhu Raajaa Avargalukku Sevikoduththaan.

18 appadiye Avargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththai Vittuvittu, Thoppu Vikkiragangalaiyum Silaigalaiyum Seviththaargal; Appozhudhu Avargal Seydha Indhak Kutraththinimiththam Yoodhaavinmelum Erusaleminmelum Kadunkobam Moondadhu.

19 avargalaith Thammidaththirkuth Thirumbappannak Karththar Avargalidaththile Theerkkadharisigalai Anuppinaar; Avargal Janangalaith Thidasaatchiyaagak Kadindhukondaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Sevikodukkavillai.

20 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Aavi Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaavin Kumaaranaana Sagariyaavinmel Iranginadhinaal, Avan Janaththirku Edhire Nindru: Neengal Karththarudaiya Karpanaigalai Meerugiradhu Enna? Idhinaal Neengal Siththiperamaatteergalendru Dhevan Sollugiraar; Neengal Karththarai Vittuvittadhinaal Avar Ungalaik Kaividuvaar Endraan.
21 adhinaal Avargal Avanukku Virodhamaaik Kattuppaadupanni, Karththarudaiya Aalayappraagaaraththil Raajaavinudaiya Karpanaiyinpadi Avanaik Kallerindhu Kondraargal.

22 appadiye Avanudaiya Thagappanaagiya Yoidhaa Thanakku Seydha Dhayaiyai Raajaavaagiya Yovaas Ninaiyaamal Avanudaiya Kumaaranaik Kondrupottaan; Ivan Saagumpodhu: Karththar Adhaip Paarppaar, Adhaik Ketpaar Endraan.

23 maru Varushaththile Seeriyaavin Senaigal Avanukku Virodhamaaga Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilum Vandhu, Janaththilirukkira Prabukkalaiyellaam Azhiththu, Kollaiyitta Avargal Udaimaigalaiyellaam Thamaskuvin Raajaavukku Anuppinaargal.

24 seeriyaavin Senai Sirukoottamaai Vandhirundhaalum, Avargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Vittuvittapadiyinaal, Karththar Magaa Periya Senaiyai Avargal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avargal Yovaasukku Thandanai Seydhaargal.

25 avargal Avanai Magaa Vedhanaikkullaanavanaaga Vittupponaargal; Avargal Purappattupponapinbu, Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaavudaiya Kumaararin Raththappazhiyinimiththam, Avanukku Virodhamaaik Kattuppaadupanni, Avan Padukkaiyile Avanaik Kondrupottaargal; Seththuppona Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Adakkampanninaargal; Aanaalum Raajaakkalin Kallaraigalil Avanai Vaikkavillai.
26 avanukku Virodhamaagak Kattuppaadupanninavargal, Ammoniya Sthreeyaana Seemaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Saabaaththum, Movaab Sthreeyaana Simreeththin Kumaaranaagiya Yosabaaththume.

27 avan Kumaararaippatriyum. Avanmel Vandha Periya Baaraththaippatriyum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Avan Balappaduththinadhaippatriyum Raajaakkalin Pusthagamaana Sariththiraththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Amadhsiyaa Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
